summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个基类，用于为从类派生的自定义数据源控件派生你自己的数据源设计器 。The class is a base class for deriving your own data source designer for a custom data source control derived from the class. 派生自的其他类 为 和 。Other classes that derive from are and .

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] ）使用此属性来确定是否在 "设计" 视图的智能标记菜单中显示 " **配置** " 命令。A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Configure** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] ）使用此属性来确定是否在 "设计" 视图中的智能标记菜单中显示 " **刷新架构** " 命令。A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Refresh Schema** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.

summary.span: 当数据源的属性发生更改且 属性值为 时，引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the properties of the data source have changed and the property value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知绑定到关联的数据源的每个控件的设计器，以便刷新它在设计宿主中的控件。The method notifies the designer of each control bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host. 此方法可以与方法一起使用 ，也可以通过使用的 参数调用方法 `false` 。This method can be suppressed with the method, or by calling the method with an argument of `false`.

summary.span: 当数据源的架构发生更改且 属性值为 时，引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the schema of the data source has changed and the property value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将绑定到关联的数据源的每个控件的设计器通知架构中的字段已更改。This method notifies the designers of each control bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed. 此方法可以与方法一起使用 ，也可以通过使用的 参数调用方法 `true` 。This method can be suppressed with the method, or by calling the method with an argument of `true`.
